item.title: solution of cs61a-ants
item.description: """CS 61A presents Ants Vs. SomeBees.""" import random from ucb import main, interact, trace from collections import OrderedDict ################ # Core Classes # ################ class Place: """A Place holds insects and has an exit to another Place.""" is_hive = False def __init__(self, name, exit=None): """Create a Place with the given NAME and EXIT. name -- A string; the name of this Place. exit -- The Place reached by exiting this Place (may be None).
